value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|We've made it to Snjárhof. We'll find
my sister in—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Are those Múspell soldiers?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes! But how? Our scouts should
have been tracking every move they
made!$k$pThey couldn't have gotten ahead of
us... So how did they beat us here?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We need to make sure my sister is
safe!$k$p$Sbs500|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait, Princess! With the soldiers,
that's—$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! How did he...$k$p$SbpBGM_MAP_BRAVE_03,0|$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, well, well... The pack of stray
pups has arrived! It has been some
time since our last meeting, whelps.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you doing here, Surtr?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|To think that you'd defeat Laegjarn
and Laevatein both... That trickster
Loki has told me everything.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I wasn't inclined to trust her, but... It
does seem to be true.$k$pDeath is too good for those useless
fools.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Where is my sister?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Your sister? You mean this hunk of
roasted meat?$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fjo...rm...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gunnthrá!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|So much pain I've inflicted on her!
Still, she refuses to divulge anything.
Tell me! What are you planning?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Perhaps she hopes to shield her little
sister from my wrath. Writhing in the
dirt, yet still a princess...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hang on, Gunnthrá! We—$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You fool! Why do you suppose she
yet lives? It was for this moment!$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$Fi500|Aaaaaaagh!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|And there it is. Before your very eyes,
she succumbs to the flames...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gunnthrá!$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Fjorm... Do not...waste time...worrying
about me. You must...live. Live! And
seek happiness!$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Gunnthrá...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Dead already? How dull.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I thought she'd put up more of a fight.
I'm not even close to satisfied...$k$pYour mother had a lot more spark,
wouldn't you say?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Surtr! Grragh! Ah... Aah...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah! Listen to that! I can hear you
fraying... What vexes you more? Is it
my strength, or your weakness?$k$pLet your rage consume you. Burn with
the fires of hate. It will become fuel
for my flames—all of it!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|How could you? Answer me, Surtr!
How could you do such a thing to my
sister? $k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-ha-hah!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Fjorm—there is no time to
argue with him. We can't defeat Surtr
yet! You said this yourself...$k$pWe must escape before we fall into
his trap! Hurry!$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My dear...$k$pMy dear $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess?$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|On my name...$k$pGunnthrá, Nifl's child...$k$pStone, to its vessel...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You live?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Pain|With my body... With my soul...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, my sister...$k$pHer final act...$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It is done. My role is at an end...$k$pYour divine weapon... I have
entrusted the power to you,
$Nu...$k$pGo now. Follow the light...$k$pI am so glad that we were able to
meet at last...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gunnthrá...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So she held off death...for a while. To
what purpose?$k$pCould it be that you are the one,
$Nu?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Fascinating. Their hopes rest with
you. I will have to make sure you burn
next!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Let's get out of here. NOW!$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Have we got everyone? No one's
hurt, are they?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We're all right!$k$pI'm with Alfonse, Princess Fjorm, and
$Nu...$k$p$EFace_Pain|C-commander! General Laegjarn has
escaped!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's my fault... I was supposed to be
watching her, but...I lost my
composure...$k$pI bring you nothing but misfortune.
How can I—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|There's nothing for it now. It is done.
We need to turn our attention to our
next move.$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The divine weapon... It's shining!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|My sister used the last of her strength
to entrust us with this...$k$pIf we follow the light, it will lead us to
the Rite of Frost. That is the power
that will defeat Surtr...once and for all.$k$p$Sbs150|
